descriptionNullable:
This dataset has been created by using the RSS feeds of several popular news websites (Being: BBC, The Daily Mail, The Independent, Wired, and CNN). The category of the RSS feed has been used to self identify the category given to the URL and article. These categories are:

- Business
- Politics
- Health
- Family And Education
- Science And Environment
- Technology
- Entertainment And Arts
- Sport
- Travel
- Food And Drink

For more information on how the data gathering worked please see the related tool on [Github](https://github.com/user1342/News-Article-Text-Classification).
title: Categorized News Articles
description:
This dataset has been created by using the RSS feeds of several popular news websites (Being: BBC, The Daily Mail, The Independent, Wired, and CNN). The category of the RSS feed has been used to self identify the category given to the URL and article. These categories are:

- Business
- Politics
- Health
- Family And Education
- Science And Environment
- Technology
- Entertainment And Arts
- Sport
- Travel
- Food And Drink

For more information on how the data gathering worked please see the related tool on [Github](https://github.com/user1342/News-Article-Text-Classification).
